# Individual Mouse Plots
```{r}
plot <- BW_data %>%
  LHPlot_adultTrt(
    fontSize = 16
  ) +
  facet_wrap(
    ~adultTrt
  ) +
  theme(
    legend.position = "none"
  )
plot

fileBaseName = "CBA_B6 LH indiv plot"
imgType = "png"
thisWidth = 11.5
thisHeight = 5
thisUnits = "in"

flexSave(
  baseName = fileBaseName,
  thisFilePrefix = NULL,
  plot = plot,
  fileType = imgType,
  filePath = file.path(plotOutputFolder, "ephys-2021-12-13"),
  width = thisWidth,
  height = thisHeight,
  units = thisUnits,
  compType = currentCompType,
  shinySettings = FALSE
)

```
# Proportion Surging

```{r}
surgeMin = 3
BW_data_wide %>%
  mutate(
    surged = maxLH > surgeMin
  ) %>%
  propSurgedPlot(
    xVar = adultTrt,
    fontSize = 16
  )
```

```{r}
plot <- BW_data_wide %>%
  plotLHAmp(surgeMin = surgeMin, textSize = 16, dotSize = 2.2)

plot

fileBaseName = "CBA_B6 Surge Plot"
imgType = "png"
thisWidth = 3.33
thisHeight = 3.77

)
```
